name: Sheeptester Scratch 3.0 SCP:Terminal Theme.
description:
The theme used in Development of the game SCP:Terminal using Sheeptester's Hacked Scratch 3.0 Editor setup.
Is a rather nice Generally SCP themed theme and the First Stylish Theme for Sheeptester's editor ever uploaded to this site!
additional_info:
By Aubarino,
Credit to Sheeptester via it's His Site.
Stylebot was used - documentation provided by Scratch and various CSS related Githubs.
